name: Sh*! Soap
description:
For those in your life who like to think theirs don't stink!

Poop soap comes scented in Fudge or Roses.

Made from an aloe and olive oil based soap and scented with fragrance oils.

Color may vary from a dark to light brown. 
Shrink wrapped to ensure air tight goodness.
Ready to give or to be recieved in a craft box.

name: Honey Bear Bubble Bath
description:
You can now stick your hand deep into the honey jar with our honey bear bubble bath soap. 

Thick like honey and it smells just as sweet.

6oz plastic honey bear container with a flip top for easy dispensing.

name: Holiday Soaps
description:
There is nothing more practical than the gift of soap.
They make perfect stocking stuffers. They are affordable for all budgets. And even if not used they offer a decorative touch in the bathroom.

Choose from 1 or all 4.

Holly Berry - a burgundy soap scented with sweet berry aromas. Topped with a layer of snow (salt) to add a mild exfoliation when used. Aloe and olive oil base soap.

XXXmas - an evergreen fragrance with traces of sweet berry. 
Topped with a layer of snow (salt) to add a mild exfoliation when used. Aloe and Olive oil base soap.

Snowflake -  creamy and fresh as the first snow fall. Made from a goats milk base and topped with a layer of snow (salt) to add a mild exfoliation when used. 

Peppermint Patty - a candy cane topping (again salt) adds a mild exfoliation when used. Created from a creamy goat milk base soap. Scented in peppermint goodness.


Each bar comes shrink wrapped ensuring air tight goodness.

name: Salted Caramel - Sugar Rush
description:
Get a sugary high from our super sweet line of soap.

Salted Caramel:
Our creamy goat milk soap is drenched is in sweet caramel fragrance and then topped in a crust of European salt. . 
The salt provides a mild exfoliation while you use it.

Soap weighs 6-7oz and comes shrink wrapped to seal in decadent goodness. 

You might be interested in our other Sugar Rush soaps or buy a 4 pack and save. 

Ohio residents will be charges sales tax.

name: Vanilla Ice - Sugar Rush
description:
Get a sugary high from our super sweet line of soap.

Vanilla Ice:
Aloe soap scented in sweet vanilla sprinkled with ice, in this case European  salt.
The salt provides a mild exfoliation while you use it, almost like a pumice stone but no wear near as abrasive. 

Soap weighs 6-7oz and comes shrink wrapped to seal in decadent goodness. 

You might be interested in our other Sugar Rush soaps or buy a 4 pack and save. 

Ohio residents will be charges sales tax.

name: Pumpkin Spiced Coffee - Sugar Rush
description:
Get a sugary high from our super sweet line of soap.

Pumpkin Spiced Coffee:
Creamy goat milk soap soaked in coffee grounds and scented in a spicy pumpkin scent. 
The coffee grounds provide a mild exfoliation and add an additional dose of scent while you use it.

Soap weighs 6-7oz and comes shrink wrapped to seal in decadent goodness. 

You might be interested in our other Sugar Rush soaps or buy a 4 pack and save. 

Ohio residents will be charges sales tax.

name: Chocolate covered strawberries - Sugar Rush
description:
Get a sugary high from our super sweet line of soap.

Chocolate Covered Strawberry Seeds:
Aloe soap scented in sweet chocolate covered in strawberry seeds. 
The strawberry seeds provide a mild exfoliation while you use it.

Soap weighs 6-7oz and comes shrink wrapped to seal in decadent goodness. 

You might be interested in our other Sugar Rush soaps or buy a 4 pack and save. 

Ohio residents will be charges sales tax.

name: Gift Pouch
description:
A ménage à trois of some of your favorite Stinky products all in zippered pouch. 

Each pouch includes:
- 2oz aloe (vegan) travel soap, comes shrink wrapped ensuring every stinky scent
- 4oz shower gel (vegan)l, PET free bottle with black top
- .5oz bath salts, kraft container

Choose from one of your favorite Stinkybomb scents:
Pink/Black Cherry
Blue/Honey Almond
Yellow/Vanilla
Green/Spearmint
Orange/Sweet Orange
Purple/Lavender *


*Purple/Lavender shower gel comes clear, hand soap and bath salts are purple.

categories.name: Not those kind of bath salts

name: Stinkybomb Shower Gel
description:
Slippery when wet takes on a whole new meaning!

Using our signature Stinkybomb scents, we have created a shower gel which creates a great lather and leaves your skin feeling and smell amazing.
Brightly colored to add some much needed POP into your bathing experience. 

Available in black cherry, honey almond, sweet orange, lavender, spearmint or vanilla.

8oz clear PET oblong container with a black disc top for easy dispensing.  Stamped with our Stinkybomb logo. 

PS- this also works great as bubble bath but you didn't hear that from us!

name: Stinkybomb Lotion - paraben free
description:
Spread it on thick cause this lotion smells amazing!

We took our signature scents and created an aloe and shea butter lotion leaves your skin feeling and smelling amazing. 

Aloe is known best for it healing properties. Just think to all those times that you baked yourself in the sun and needed a healing agent. Yeah that was aloe.
Shea butter is highly moisturizing for dry skin.
When you add your favorite Stinkybomb scent, magic happens on your skin. 

Available in black cherry, honey almond, sweet orange, lavender, spearmint or vanilla.
8oz clear PET oblong container with a black disc top for easy dispensing.  Stamped with our Stinkybomb logo. 

MINERAL OIL AND PARABEN FREE.

name: Texas Soap
description:
You don't mess with Texas but now you can wash with Texas.

Handmade, from start to finish.
We start by creating a meticulous cut out of each state. We then create a master mold from that design which is used for our soap production. Not a one of our novelty soap molds are mass produced or made outside of our hands. 
Every bar of soap is individually melted, colored and scented. While your soap cools in the mold, we hand stamp every box. Each soap comes shrink wrapped for air tight goodness and packaged into a box with crinkle paper.

Made from an olive oil base, tinted in purple and scented in lavender. Each soap weighs in at 3.75 oz. Your soap will come packaged in a kraft box, hand stamped with our logo and nestled in a bed of kraft colored crinkle paper. 
Makes a great gift and comes ready to give or receive.

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

name: Texas Soap - black cherry
description:
You don't mess with Texas but you can wash with Texas.

Handmade, from start to finish right.
We start by creating a meticulous cut out of each state. We then create a master mold from that design which is used for our soap production. Not a one of our novelty soap molds are mass produced or made outside of our hands. 
Every bar of soap is individually melted, colored and scented. While your soap cools in the mold, we hand stamp every box. Each soap comes shrink wrapped for air tight goodness and packaged into a box with crinkle paper.

Made from an olive oil base and scented with fragrance oil.
Each soap weighs in at 3.75 oz. Your soap will come packaged in a kraft box, hand stamped with our logo and nestled in a bed of kraft colored crinkle paper. 
Makes a great gift and comes ready to give or receive.

Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

description:
We've turned a science flask into a hand soap dispenser.

250 ml's glass flask to fill up on your own.

Comes with a black pump and a cork stopper. 

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about international shipping rates.

name: Not those kind of bath salts - Super sized, vanilla
description:
Scent your bathing experience and look smart while doing it.

Our 250ml science flasks are filled with deeply scented European bath salts. Scented in vanilla and colored yellow.

Medical flask are made of glass and sealed with a cork. Use as much or as little salt as you wish.
Contact for a discount on refills.

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about Priority International shipping rates.

categories.name: Not those kind of bath salts

name: Box of Love
description:
Tell the person you love most that they stink and need to take a bath but at the end of the day you love them all the same. 

Included in your Box of Love:
1  Hand Grenade Soap - scented in black cherry and colored pink, aloe soap.
6 Assorted bath salts, individually packed in test tubes and sealed with a cork stopper. Scents are black cherry, sweet orange, vanilla, honey almond, lavender and spearmint.
1 I love to hate you soap - Red heart scented in black cherry. Black heart scented in sandalwood, both hearts are made from aloe soap.  White base is created from goats milk soap and scented in both black cherry and sandalwood. 

Kraft box measures 10 x 4 1/2  4 1/2 and comes filled with our loose paper fill, for extra padding and a decorative touch. 
Boxes are hand stamped.

*none of these items come individually boxed. All soaps are shrink wrapped, insuring air tight freshness. glass medical beaker not included in purchase.

categories.name: Not those kind of bath salts

name: Not those kind of bath salts
description:
Enjoy a 6 pack of soothing bath salts.

We've taken our line of scents and bright colors and added them to course bath salt. 

In this 6 pack you'll get each of the following scents:
pink/black cherry
blue/honey almond
purple/lavender
orange/sweet orange
green/spearmint
yellow/vanilla

This makes a great gift or a great way to sample all our scents for yourself.

Each test tube measures 13x100 mm in size and sealed with a cork. Test tubes are made of glass. 
The 6 pack comes in a kraft box with a clear lid. The test tubes are gently nestled with shredded kraft paper.

Medical flask not included.

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about Priority International shipping rates.

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

categories.name: Not those kind of bath salts

name: I LOVE to Hate you
description:
Created in a 3 step process. 
1)We individually create each heart shape with aloe soap in pink and black. 
2) Using a goats milk base we create a thin layer of soap which the heart rest upon. 
3) Lastly, we pour another layer of goats milk securely holding the hearts in place while leaving a small amount exposed above the rest of the bar.

The red heart soap (Love) comes scented in black cherry.
The black heart soap (Hate) comes scented in sandalwood.
The white base is a combination of black cherry and sandalwood

The hearts are made from aloe soap while the white bases are all made from a goats milk base. 
Every bar measures 2 1/2 x 3 1/2 x 1 and weighs just under 5 ounces. 
Soaps are individually packaged in a kraft brown box, which comes hand stamped with I LOVE to HATE you. Every bar is shrink wrapped, ensuring air-tight freshness.


Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about international shipping rates.

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

name: US soap scented in sandalwood
description:
.US shaped soap scented in sandalwoodFrom StinkybombSoap
   Lather up with freedom and a chance to hold America in the palm of your hand.

We start by creating a meticulous cut out of the 48 states. We then create a master mold from that design which is used for our soap production.
Not a one of our novelty soap molds are mass produced or made outside of our hands. 
Every bar of soap is individually melted, colored and scented. While your soap cools in the mold, we hand stamp every box. Each soap comes shrink wrapped for air tight goodness and packaged into a box with crinkle paper.

Made from a goats milk base, tinted in white and scented in sandalwood. Each soap weighs in at 3.625 oz. Your soap will come packaged in a kraft box, hand stamped with our logo and nestled in a bed of kraft colored crinkle paper. 
Makes a great gift and comes ready to give or receive.

Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

name: Pride Soap
description:
Created for Project Zero Ohio. A non-profit created to help fill in the cracks in AIDS/HIV patient funding. Specifically the day to day care and needs of those affected and afflicted by HIV/Aids.
ALL proceeds of our Pride Soap go right back to Project Zero Ohio.

Each bar of our Pride Soap is crafted layer by layer and created in small batches.
The layer and color change offers up a new fragrance as you use it:
Pink/Black Cherry
Orange/Sweet Orange
Yellow/Vanilla
Green/Spearmint
Blue/Honey Almond
Purple/Lavender

Pride soaps come packaged in a brown kraft box with a sneak window to view all the layers. In true Stinkybomb fashion we hand stamp every box with the lovely Nina West's image.
Each bar of soap comes shrink wrapped ensuring airtight freshness upon opening. 
Soap weigh in at 5oz and are made from an aloe base.

Find out more at www.projectzeroohio.com or contact projectzeroohio@gmail.com.

name: Purple Cassette Tape Soap
description:
Rock the dirt away!

We made the mold from an actual cassette tape. The final soap is 1/8 of an inch thicker creating a more substantial bar of soap. You can see all the detail that a real cassette offers: sprockets, screws, and even the label bar where you wrote in the title of your mix tape.

Created using an aloe and olive oil base in purple and comes in a lavender scent. The cassette tape measures 4" tall by 2 1/2" wide by 1/2" thick and weighs 3.1oz. Each bar of soap comes packaged ready to give or receive in a brown craft box with a clear lid, stuffed with loose shred and sealed with a Stinkybomb label.

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about international shipping rates.

Due to the modification from the original these soaps are too wide to fit into a traditional cassette case.

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

name: Green Digital Camera Soap
description:
Lights, CAMERA, action!
Use this camera soap to wash away the dirt and prepare for all your close ups!

We modified a digital camera and embossed it with our Stinkybomb name to make our most tech savvy soap to date. 
All the detail, from the power button, to the zoom function and the flat panel on the back, has come through. You can even see the flash indicator icon. 

Created using an aloe and olive oil base in green and comes scented in spearmint. The camera measures 3 3/4" wide by 2 1/4" tall by 3/4" thick and weighs 4oz. 
Each bar of soap comes packaged ready to give or receive in a brown craft box with a clear lid, stuffed with loose shred and sealed with a Stinkybomb label.

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about international shipping rates.

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

name: Blue Hand Grenade Soap, Home of the Original Hand Grenade Soap
description:
Blast away the dirt with our hand grenade soap.

Cast from an actual demilled WWII steel body Grenade. The grenade was cast in a 2-part silicone mold so it holds all of the detail of the original. Created using an aloe and olive oil base soap in a blue and comes scented in honey almond.
Measures 4 1/2" tall by 2 1/2" wide and weighs 5.1oz.
Comes packaged in a brown craft box with crinkle paper

Shipped USPS 2-3 day priority mail, with confirmation email to allow better tracking. Individuals outside the US may contact us about international shipping rates.

1% from each grenade sale goes towards Wounded Warrior Project
www.woundedwarriorproject.org

Contact us for multiples of this or any other item in our shop. 
Ohio residents will be charged sales tax upon check out.

STINKYBOMB DISCLAIMER:
THIS ITEM SHOULD NOT BE TAKEN ON AIRPLANES. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM AND THEN GIVE IT TO SOMEONE WHO IS ABOUT TO STEP ON A PLANE. DO NOT ASSUME THAT PUTTING IT IN YOUR CHECK IN LUGGAGE WILL ALLOW THE SOAP TO PASS ANY AIRPORT SECURITY SCANNERS.
